mapper.select:
SELECT e.ID eid , e.EmpName, e.EmpNo, e.Pwd, e.DeptID, e.Remark, e.Disabled, d.ID did , d.DeptName, d.Remark dRemark, d.Disabled dDisabled FROM sy_emp e , sy_dept d WHERE e.DeptID = d.ID and e.Disabled = 0 AND e.ID != 1
AND (e.EmpNo LIKE '%${search}%' or e.Remark LIKE '%${search}%' or e.EmpName LIKE '%${search}%' or e.ID = #{search} or d.DeptName LIKE '%${search}%')
ORDER BY e.EmpNo
LIMIT #{currentPage} , #{pageCount} ;
mapper.update: UPDATE sy_emp SET EmpName = #{empName}, Remark = #{remark}, DeptID = #{deptID.ID} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sy_emp(EmpName, EmpNo, Pwd, DeptID, Remark, Disabled) VALUES (#{empName} , #{empNo} , #{pwd} , #{deptID.ID} ,#{remark}, #{disabled});
